subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Andy Bean hit all 18 greens in regulation and finished with a seven-under-par 65 to take the first-round lead at the Administaff Small Business Classic at The Woodlands Country Club in Texas. Bean had a one-stroke lead over Jay Haas and Joey Sindelar.
